actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Natural Gas Act of 1977 to authorize the President of the United State to order emergency deliveries and transportation of natural gas to deal with existing or imminent shortages by providing assistance in meeting requirements for high-priority users; and to provide authority for short-term purchases of natural gas.

summary.text: Emergency Natural Gas Act Amendments - Authorizes the President to order emergency deliveries and transportation of natural gas during existing or imminent shortages to assist high-priority users in meeting their requirements.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Natural Gas Act of 1977 to authorize the President of the United State to order emergency deliveries and transportation of natural gas to deal with existing or imminent shortages by providing assistance in meeting requirements for high-priority users; and to provide authority for short-term purchases of natural gas.
